<js>
//ä¸€è¡Œä¸ªæ•°
var nums = 4 ;
//åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
var separator = '::'

//æ ‡é¢˜::é“¾æ¥::ä¸€è¡Œä¸ªæ•°::åˆ†ç±»

all=[

"å›´åŸ::å›´åŸ::::a",
"ä¸‰ä½“::ä¸‰ä½“::::a",
"åŸºç£å±±ä¼¯çˆµ::åŸºç£å±±ä¼¯çˆµ::::a",
"Sue Grafton::Sue Grafton::::a",
];

//@å¤©å¤©gg@é…·å®‰ ä¸‹é¢ä¸è¦åŠ¨
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆ
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zh.usa1lib.org/s/"+url+"?page={{page}}":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zh.usa1lib.org/s/'+url+'?page={{page}}':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//æ•°å€¼è®¾å®š

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>
